It is a regular process for obtaining feedback on the quality of an employee's work from their colleagues and customers. Reviews are collected and processed by Resource Managers, after which employees are provided with consolidated feedback.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Feedback results can be taken into account when developing an employee's
